import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Checkbox, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from 'axios'; import { NormalBrandType, NormalBrandTypeLabel, LuxuryBrandType, LuxyryBrandTypeLabel } from "../Constants/Brand/BrandConstants"; import { Modal, } from "react-bootstrap"; const Info = ({ brand, handleClose }) => { const getBrandTypeName = (id) => { return id == LuxuryBrandType ? LuxyryBrandTypeLabel : NormalBrandTypeLabel; } return ( <> Detailed Brand Infomation
Id:
{brand.name}
quantity:
{brand.quantity}
originalPrice:
{brand.originalPrice}
price:
{brand.price}
description:
{brand.description}
timeCreate:
{brand.timeCreate}
status:
{brand.status}
viewCount:
{brand.viewCount}

{brand.details}
Image:
 ); } export default Info;
